entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Becoming clear late this evening and overnight. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to near valley bottom this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 27 March 2023
